name: Making the most of low and zero carbon energy technologies in buildings
location: This stream will take place in (room to be confirmed)
description: This session looks at some new technological advances in products which produce low and zero carbon energy in buildings.  It highlights building integrated energy solutions; the importance of designing in low and zero carbon technologies at the early design stages; and some specific strategies for harnessing “free cooling” technologies.

presentations.name: Free-cooling strategies
presentations.speakers: Guy Nevill, Senior Partner, Max Fordham

presentations.name: Building-integrated renewable energy technologies
presentations.speakers: David Coyne, Managing Director, Res Inbuilt

presentations.name: Integrating low and zero carbon technologies at early design stage
presentations.speakers:
Andrew Eastwell, Chief Executive, BSRIA
Regis Lecussan, Chief Executive, RayCREATIS
